Hi Gordon:
 Would love to be there but Japan is getting skipped this year a=
s we are to move to Georgia, near Atlanta within days, and you can imagine =
the work involved. Please let me know if and when the Dutch shinsa will tak=
e place. Regards, Arnold




>>> robsongo@... 10/12/05 7:18 PM >>>
Hi=
 all,

 

Just wanted to pass this along to those of you coming to Tokyo at=
 the end of
this month for the Dai-Token Ichi. The NTHK will hold its annua=
l big sword
appreciation meeting on October 30th from 1 pm at our regular m=
eeting place
near Shinanomachi. The theme is famous Koto and koshirae. Ther=
e is a 5,000
yen fee for attendance. Anyone who wants to attend, but does n=
ot know how to
get there can meet in front of Shinanomachi station at aroun=
d one and I will
be happy to guide you. Hope to see many of you soon. Also,=
 as in the past,
if everyone wants to get together for Saturday night dinne=
r and drinks, let
me know and I will get a reservation made.

 

Gordon
